cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This HTML  Canvas quick reference cheat sheet lists the common HTML5  Canvas design tags in readable layout.

cards.title: Basic Setup
cards.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Canvas Example</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <canvas
      id="myCanvas"
      width="500"
      height="400"
      style="border:1px solid #000000;"
    ></canvas>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

cards.title: Getting the Context
cards.code:
const canvas = document.getElementById('myCanvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
